definitions.text: (music) rapid sliding up or down the musical scale
examples: the violinist was indulgent with his swoops and slides

definitions.text: a swift descent through the air
move down on as if in an attack
examples: The raptor swooped down on its prey
The teacher swooped down upon the new students

definitions.text: move with a sweep, or in a swooping arc
seize or catch with a swooping motion
